question: Mahmud of Ghazni led a raid against the Rai of Bhera on the River Jhelum in which of the following years?
explanation: In 1001 CE, Mahmud crossed the Indian frontier and in the following year, he defeated Jayapala. The rich spoils from this expedition encouraged Mahmud to repeat his raids and in 1004 A.D. He did the second raid against the Rai of Bhera.
